name: Enter The Lost Chamber
description:
Delve into the unforgiving darkness of "Enter The Lost Chamber", a pixel art roguelike that challenges you to explore deadly dungeons infested with supernatural monsters. Armed with an arsenal of varied weapons, face hordes of zombies, bats, and other abominations in a never-ending fight for survival. Each descent into the depths offers new surprises and unique challenges, while the possibility of facing the final boss at any time adds constant tension. Delve into the darkness, collect mysterious artifacts, and become the master of shadows in “Enter The Lost Chamber”.




  • Throw yourself into a cycle consisting of a series of three dungeons. Each cycle completed presents a unique challenge and formidable enemies to face.
  • Each cycle completed is more difficult than the previous one thanks to new enemies, new behaviors, and increased difficulty.
  • At the end of each dungeon, an epic boss awaits, ready to test your skills and strategy. Defeat is not an option, as failing erases the player's progress.




  • Find, mix and upgrade over 25 items.
  • Change weapons radically changing your experience by discovering hidden rooms. Explore the dungeons and discover them all!
  • Reroll the wheel of luck in exchange for a few crystals to hope to find the item you need!




  • Face more than 10 different monsters some of which have visual and behavioral changes as you progress through the cycles.
  • 3 memorable and unique bosses challenging your skills, your reflexes and your strategy you can't wait to face and stop your progress.
  • Deathkeeper, the powerful final boss of Enter The Lost Chamber, is accessible from the start of the game. Go without equipment if you dare or perform cycles to gain power before this epic encounter.
